ASSIGNMENT 3 - PHOTOS
Bansari Mehta(bm844) and Anvay Patel(acp205)

Single-user photo application that allows storage and management of photos in one or more albums

Packages

  • photos.app
  • photos.control
  • photos.view. (This has all FXML files.)

    • Hierarchy For All Packages

    • photos.app
      • photos.app.Photos
    • photos.control.AdminController
    • photos.control.Album (implements java.io.Serializable)
    • photos.control.AllAlbumsController
    • photos.control.LoginController
    • photos.control.OpenAlbumController
    • photos.control.Photo (implements java.io.Serializable)
    • photos.control.SearchPhotosController
    • photos.control.SlideShowController
    • photos.control.TagCategory (implements java.io.Serializable)
    • photos.control.TagCategory.Tag (implements java.io.Serializable)
    • photos.control.User (implements java.io.Serializable)
    • photos.control.UserDataController (implements java.io.Serializable)

    Java Classes and its Application

    • Package photos.app
      • Photos.java
        This class is the entry point for the Photos application.
        Application window start when we run this java program
    • Package photos.control
      • photos.control.AdminController
        When the admin login, they are redirected to AdminController class. This has functionality to ,
        • Create new user, delete user, logout and initialize to display user list.
        • Deletes the user with the username specified
        • Logout
        • Initializes the controller by setting the adminList to display the userList.
      • photos.control.Album
        This class represents an Album containing a collection of Photos.
        • It allows to add a Photo in the album.
        • Gets / Sets the name of the album
        • Returns the list of photos in this album.
        • Gets the numbers of photos in the album
        • Gets the name of the album
      • photos.control.AllAlbumsController
        This class is entry point when a user logs in.
        • Creates a new album with new name.
        • Displays all the details of the albums such as date range of photos, number of photos, and album name
        • Opens a screen for searching photos within a specified date range and tag pairs.
        • Rename or Delete the album
        • Logout
      • photos.control.LoginController
        This class is the controller for the Login Scene.
        • It allows user to login with username as admin, or new created userid.
      • photos.control.OpenAlbumController
        This Class is the controller class for the OpenAlbum scene.
        • It allows to upload photo, add tags and tag category.
        • Remove tag, tag category or photo from the album.
        • Copy or move photo to other album.
        • Allows to go back to previous screen
        • Allows to slideshow the photos
        • Logout
      • photos.control.Photo
        The Photo class represents a photo object, with properties such as caption, image path, last modified date, and a list of tags.
        • It allows to set and get image path
        • Set and get image caption
        • Set and get tags
        • Set and get last modified date
      • photos.control.SearchPhotosController
        When the admin login, they are redirected to AdminController class.
        • Displays photos
        • Search photos
        • Allows to go back to previous screen
        • Logout
      • photos.control.SlideShowController
        SlideShowController.
        • Slides through previous and next photos in the same album.
      • photos.control.TagCategory
        TagCategory.
        • Get and set tag category name.
      • photos.control.User
        Based on logged in user, it allows all photo management functionaities.
        • Add and remove albums
        • Add remove tag category
      • photos.control.UserDataController
        UserDataController.
        • It allows to add new user and delete user.

    FXML files

    • photos.view
      • photos.view.Admin.fxml
      • photos.view.AllAlbums.fxml
      • photos.view.Login.fxml
      • photos.view.OpenAlbum.fxml
      • photos.view.SearchPhotos.fxml
      • photos.view.SlideShow.fxml
